title: What are the best rap songs with acoustic guitar? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well the one that immediately comes to mind is technically a remix: Nas ft. Pac - Thugz Mansion (God's Son version)  Undeniably one of the greatest hip-hop songs of all time... And the other one that always comes to mind for me is: The Pharcyde - Runnin'  (Although the acoustic guitar is sampled, so not sure if you'd count that...?)
